node.html: I'm a software engineer based in Bangalore, India creating projects on python, java ,machine learning and whatever I can get my hands on. Currently looking for new opprtunities.

Hello! I'm Nivedita.M, a software engineer based in Bangalore, India.

I spend my time working on building products, services, and experiences that are meaningful, purposeful, and fun. I work somewhere at the intersection between design, technology and business development, and have a deeply insatiable desire to create. Iâ€™ve always been a creative person, and my passion for technology and understanding people has shaped me into the engineer I am today.

I am currently pursuing my Engineering from Rashtreeya Vidyalaya College of Engineering. I love to create art work on photoshop @psnive.

Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

• I was assigned to optimize ML,DL,NN algorithms, to determine the minimum log size required for intent identification, and to identify and prove which of the intent classification method is the best method (interms of memory and percentage of accuracy).
  • Work with determining which is the best method for intent pattern identification using rasa, NLTK, LSTM, CRF

• I was in charge of data cleaning and assigned to a project where I was working on performance prediction of employees based on their attendance.
  • Worked with pandas,scikit-learn, tableau.

• I worked as a Machine learning Intern. I have had the chance to teach and make courses on Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Python Programming
  • I Worked with image processing for Autonomous car.
• I was assigned to work on a Home Automation using Raspberry pi and Google Assistance. I had worked with Raspberry pi, matlab and thinkspeak
